text: Hello, I have a specific question about the new beta quote generation templates, where should I go with it?
How do I go about added a fellow dev to the HS slack channels?
They should get an invite almost immediately
Have some advanced questions regarding bringing in an RSS feed into an outside website. How do we create a custom RSS feed so we can sort by tags?

Hello HubSpot community :wave:

With Aircall, we are looking into the creation of custom `timeline events` through HubSpot’s <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/timeline|API> in order to log some activity.
I’ve looked everywhere, it is impossible to find information about the following question:
> Is it possible for HubSpot users to base themselves on such custom timeline events, created through the Public API, to generate HubSpot custom reports, thanks to the Analytics tools and Dashboards? 
Any insights here? Appreciate the help.
